favourite.article: Lord! Nothing else I seek; no one else for me. Thank You for I know everything apart from You is temporary and unsatisfying. Lord, lead me to fully and absolutely give my whole being unto Thee!
This is my whole life's goal and theme - to love the Lord more supremely!
Draw me Lord each day!!!
With a pure heart will I see You!
Oh Lord, thank You for loving each and every one of us no matter what! With such an unconditional love, it's so easy to just turn to You everyday. Thank You Lord, I just love You.
我們愛，因為神先愛我們。 約翰一書 4:19 We love because He first loved us. 1 John 4:19

Growing up, we had a song book with more than one verse to this hymn in it! I recall part of the second one: Lord Your love has shown me the way, Now my prayer is that I would be, Ever always, something-something, Open unto Thee; Does anyone know where to find these verses? It'd be great to see them again.
Lord make my goal and my life's theme be to love You most supremely.
Lord we just love You!
We sang this song at the European Young People's Conference in Poland 2015 and I really enjoyed this hymn! Oh, Lord, draw me each day! I want to see you with a pure heart!
I love You Lord! I love you Phoebe!
Everyday and every moment, O Lord, capture us!
Lord, You love me so immensely; I would love You more intensely.
How I needed to listen to this today. The Lord has captured my heart and is bringing me to the foot of the Cross. Thank You Lord Jesus for loving even me!
Praise the Lord! You love me so immensely!
Draw me Lord!! Nothing I seek!

Seven years ago I consecrated myself in an absolute way to the Lord. Today, I am reminded of that consecration and so I am led to reconsecrate myself once again in a deep and thorough way to the Lord.
LORD JESUS, thanks for such a love...make me a man who loves you without any reservation, my heart will be fully and wholly for YOU. OH LORD JESUS I LOVE YOU...
Oh my God! This more than a hymn should be the prayer of every Christian. Simply wonderful.
This is awesome, Wow, Lord, how words that exult You inspires us. Listening to this with my son, who drums and immediately began tapping to the music on his legs!
Lord, You love me so immensely; I would love You more intensely!
It inspires me. I just want to love You more Lord.
This song makes me remember all the times when I am with the saints. It makes me happy and keeps me from being sad.

Lord Jesus thank You for loving me so immensely. I really like this hymn because every time I heard it I always turn to my mingled spirit and this hymn can help to have an intimate fellowship with the Lord. And also if I hear this song it takes my veils away. Praise God!!!

I like this song because we sing it every 12 o' clock after my classes and this is my favorite song in new tune like Lord you love so immensely I sing along with sisters Jenifer, Manliguez and her husband, brother Jojo Manliguez at in student center.
I love this song so much! My gospel friend also loves this song and he picks it every meeting! I'm just so thankful that my friend is saved! Lord I love You sooooo much!

Lord Jesus draw me! We will run after Thee! Take my veils away Lord. Make my heart pure toward all things. Even in our love, cause us to seek nothing else. Lord, we fully and absolutely give ourselves unto Thee!

Lord thank You for loving me so Immensely, I love you Intensely, help me to love others Intensely like You do. I love this song very much because it is such a sweet melody to God and the words are so intimate when I sing to my Father God. Thanks for this song.

Lord, I love You. You are my miss everyday. Please make me love You more everyday. I need Your love more and Your touch more. Please, please, please, please draw me every day, every moment and every minute. Please be with me. I need Your mercy.
Paborito ko to! ganda ng message....
Thank you for this song of prayer to our Holy Lord. I typed in Lord, help me to love You more, and this came up. God Bless.
Wonderful hymn! so peaceful to sing! with a pure heart will I see You, Lord! Lord, I just love You. Nothing else I seek! No one else for me!
Lorraine sent this from a home meeting. It sings from my spirit to Christ.
I enjoy this song very much! Praise the Lord!

Thank You Lord for loving me so immensely and I would LOVE You more intensely. Oh Lord, capture me every day and every moment. Draw me and keep me faithful unto Thee. Lord, be my goal and my life's theme.

O, Lord, may you help me love You more. I need to touch Your love every day and every moment. Draw me Lord each day, I wanna love You each day, more and more. There are so many beautiful things on earth, and they really attract me. O Lord, I need Your mercy, please take my veils away and I just wanna seek You.
I love this song because it always reminds me that the love of the Lord is an immensely unconditionable love. Thank You Lord for Your great love. I love You, Lord.
I really love this song because it really touches my heart. Thank You Lord for loving me immensely. Amen!
I'm from the church in Manila (Hall 4). I love God because He loves me first and thanks to God He loves me immensely.
Oh Lord capture us! Oh Lord draw us everyday! Amen. I love this tune and these words because it should be what we say to the Lord everyday. =)

I love this song because it leads me to consecration and it makes me so meaningful. I can't stop crying when hearing this song. Amen. May the Lord preserve our vessel until His second coming. Amen. I do love the Lord more immensely. thanks Ann for this song.
This song rekindle my love for Him, who loved me since the beginning of time. Oh Lord, I do LOVE You!
God loves us so immensely, so I pray that we would love Him more intensely and also that He would draw us each day that all our days will be just for Him.
I really like this song. Every time I sing this song, I feel I have a new from God, quite fresh, quite deep.
Oh, Lord! Amen! Hallelujah! Praise the Lord! This is our favorite song. Saints, let us praise the Lord by singing spiritual songs. Live according to the ascended Christ! Amen!
I really love this song. Amen.
My love to the Lord was stirred up when I sang the song. I love You, Lord!
wow!
Lord Jesus capture me! Keep me faithful unto Thee!

I remember hearing this song for the first time and wondering why nobody taught it to me earlier. Songs like this keep my love strong for the Lord, and I'm sure it's helpful to any young one with a heart for the Lord but finding themselves loving other things.

i also the translated one in malay from the indonesian saints. when i first listen to this song, i was deeply moved from within as i kept on praying that God might draw me out of myself, the flesh, sins , world, and the rebellious within me. till al my life will be prensent to Him fully and absolutely gain my whole being.
O, TUHAN KU PUJIMU DAPATKAN AKU DAN SASARAN HIDUPKU KIAN CINTA PADAMU. (BETAPA DALAM KASIHMU, KU PUN CINTA PADAMU, TIAP HARI TIAP WAKTU DAPATKAN AKU, SASARAN HIDUPKU TUHAN KIAN CINTA PADAMU, S'PENUH HATI JIWAKU, JAGAKU SETIA SELALU. TARIKKU TUHAN, BUANG SELUBUNGKU, HATI MURNI MEMANDANGMU, DIKAU KU CINTA, TIADA YANG LAIN, YANG AKU CARI, D'NGAN MUTLAKKU PERSEMBAHKAN, SELURUH DIRIKU PADAMU.)
I JUST LOVE THIS OFFERING PRAYER. LORD, CAUSE ME TO LOVE YOU MORE EACH DAY. I WOULD OFFERED UP MYSELF UNTO YOU EVERYDAY SO THAT YOU WOULD GAIN ME THOROUGHLY. PRAISE YOU LORD!!

As I sing this song, my eyes are filled with tears. Really, saints, it's a privilege to love the Lord. I'm so glad that I have found Him, or rather, He has found me - the lost sheep /the prodigal son. Lord Jesus, remove my veils,that I may behold and reflect like a mirror your glory... Capture me, that I may run after you... be one with you... may the vision of the New Jerusalem capture me...
we need to empty our whole being! and also were lucky that God choose us...this song is so sweet and wonderful. i love this so much! amen..
I was automatically touched by the Lord's love when I fist sang this song. Even now, when I heard this song, my eyes and heart are full of tears of joy and sweet.
Yes, Lord You love me so immensely! Draw me, Lord each day. Take my veils away!! Lord I love You.

The first time I sang the song it really touched my heart so deep, it made me realize that the Lord loves us so immensely.... it really encourages me to love Him more intense... hope all of us would grant what the Lord desire for us..... AMEN.

I just thank the Lord for loving me so immensely. Even if my heart still turns to the world, this song draws me back to the Lord and little by little, causes me to fully and absolutely give my whole being unto Him. I just love You, Lord!

I love my Lord so much coz He's loving me so immensely...more intensely and... more supremely (it's the highest one). It's a love from above, a truly genuine divine love. Oh Lord! I love you because you first love me. Amen!
Thank you Lord Jesus, You love me so immensely!
I love God because He loves me first. He has captured my heart.
This song is very memorable.
It just brings back memories and I just like it alot. :) Its a nice song.
This song is very meaningful.
